description:
The trusted personal injury attorneys at the law office of Ray B. Marglous, P.C. & Associates, represent the people of Clayton, Missouri, in personal injury cases. Compassionate advocacy is offered to those who have a claim because of the following situations: motor vehicle accidents, unsafe or defective condition on someone's property, on-the-job accidents, wrongful death, slip-and-fall accidents, motorcycle accidents, commercial vehicle accidents, trucking accidents, assault and battery, animal bites, brain injuries, birth injuries, construction accidents, nursing home abuse, medical malpractice, defective products, sexual abuse and railroad worker accidents.

We want to help our clients get on a road to financial and physical recovery after they have been unfairly injured in an accident due to someone else's poor choices or negligence. The financial stress that comes from medical bills, pain and suffering, and loss of income after an accident can be debilitating on its own. The attorneys at our law office work hard to maximize the compensation our clients get, whether through negotiation or a trial.

Anyone who has been injured in an accident and feels they may have a personal injury claim is welcome to a free initial consultation with a highly skilled attorney at the law office of Ray B. Marglous, P.C. & Associates. We work closely with our clients to make sure they are kept up to date on what is going on with their case.

The injured deserves an aggressive advocate on their side, as the insurance company is not afraid to minimize the compensation they give out. Whether our clients were injured at work or in a nursing home, we are dedicated to getting them the justice they deserve.
